meaning: It is my essence (prakriti) that manifests visibly as the Ashta murtis (the eight forms) of earth, fire, water etc.
commentary:
‘Moola’ refers to the fundamental cause. ‘Prakriti’ combines 3 words pra+ kri+ ti. ‘Pra’ means immense/ supreme. ‘Kri’ is creation (sristi). Prakriti thus means a supreme/ vast creation that can run on its own. Thus ‘मूलप्रकृतिःऽ (‘Mūlaprakṛtiḥ’) means She is the fundamental cause behind this vast creation.

मूलप्रकृतिः (Mūlaprakṛtiḥ) is the first amongst Her tattvas (principles). Bhagavad Gita explains this as- bhinna prakriti ashtada –
